text: Pavel Razmikovich Dalaloyan (; 22 November 1978 – 22 June 2017) was a Russian football player. ==Career== Danaloyan played football for FC Lokomotiv Liski before joining FC Uralan Elista where he would make 4 Russian Premier League appearances. ==Death== Dalaloyan was killed when an automobile struck him as he was walking on a sidewalk in Voronezh. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Elista players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Metallurg Lipetsk players Category:FC Slavyansk Slavyansk-na-Kubani players Category:Association football forwards
title: Pavel Dalaloyan
